description: painted design in black on white ground; horizontal bands with diagonal intersecting lines; triangular shapes painted in black creating a star-like pattern that is larger at center and smaller near rim and foot; wide shoulder with small foot and mouth; thin white band around rim with wider painted band nearest lip
